snippet: Activists say they won’t leave City Hall until leaders agree to changes in department policies and an investment in education and social services.
abstract: Protesters in Baltimore occupy City Hall to mark their opposition to permanent appointment of interim Police Commissioner Kevin Davis.
lead_paragraph: Activists say they won’t leave City Hall until leaders agree to changes in department policies and an investment in education and social services.

headline.print_headline: Protesters Aim to Alter Police Tactics in Baltimore
headline.main: Protesters Aim to Alter Police Tactics in Baltimore
